General.Name: STS Holding S.A.
General.Description: STS Holding S.A. operates as a sports betting company in Poland and Europe. The company's services include sportsbook, virtual sports, online casino, live dealer games, and a range of eSports betting. It provides its services through its website, mobile version, and Android and iOS systems applications, as well as through a network of approximately 400 stationary premises. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Katowice, Poland. As of August 16, 2023, STS Holding S.A. operates as a subsidiary of Entain Plc.

3.Name: Lukasz  Borkowski
3.Title: Head of Corp. Communications & Investor Relations
